DOC.brief_summary: Depression affect 5 % 10 % old adult see primary care setting.Late-life depression often chronic recurrent associate substantial suffering , functional impairment , diminish health-related quality life.Depressed , old primary care patient frequent user general medical service may poor adherence medical treatments.They also increase risk death suicide medical illness .
